title.rendered: RHINO BAR SUIT TOYOTA FJ CRUISER

content.rendered:
RHINO4x4 EVOLUTION FRONT REPLACEMENT WINCH BAR SUITABLE FOR THE TOYOTA FJ CRUISER!

The new and exciting Rhino4x4 Evolution front replacement winch bar is available for order now. These new bars give your vehicle an agressive 4wd look without looking like a truck. They are a tough 3 and 5mm all steel construction and protect all of your engine vitals. They also give you full winch compatibility, 2 rated recovery points, industry leading angle of approach, and a heavy duty bash plate.

-The Evolution Bumper is finished in a hard-wearing slightly textured black Powder coat as standard and can be colour coded as an option. It is a 3mm and 5mm steel construction and includes as standard a 5mm Aluminium bash plate not offered on other brands. We also offer as standard, LED fog lights which are an option on many other brands.

-The Evolution bumper has carried out many dynamic crash tests here in Australia to ensure it complements the existing safety systems for example Air bags. The Standard bumper on your vehicle gets removed completely and can be saved / sold.

Includes:

Standard with Winch mount

Integrated LED Fog lights

5mm Aluminium Bash / Protection plate

2 x Vehicle recovery points

Bolt on centre hoop

excerpt.rendered:
RHINO BAR SUIT TOYOTA FJ CRUISER

Please note: Depending on stock & availability, the current wait time for this product is approx. 30 – 90 days from date of order.
